name: Big 5 Personality Traits
description: Identify how your character expresses these five major personality traits

attributes.name: Openness
attributes.description: The degree to which they are creative, curious, and eager to learn or experience life (e.g. high or low)

attributes.name: Conscientiousness
attributes.description: The degree to which they are thoughtful, organized, detail-oriented, or goal-directed (e.g. high or low)

attributes.name: Extraversion
attributes.description: The degree to which they are talkative, assertive, expressive, or thrive in social situations (e.g. high or low)

attributes.name: Agreeableness
attributes.description: The degree to which they are trustworthy, kind, altruistic, helpful, or empathetic (e.g. high or low)

attributes.name: Neuroticism
attributes.description: The degree to which they are sad, moody, anxious, irritable, or emotionally unstable (e.g. high or low)
